title: abeec 100 Classic Games Compendium | Collection of Classic Family Board Games | Games Compendium includes Ludo, Chess, Draughts and Playing Cards
features: Family Board Games Classic Collection - This classic collection of board games brings together numerous classic games in one box of games. includes Chess, Ludo Game Board, Snakes & Ladders, Matchstick games and a full pack of playing cards.

A classic board games set for families, kids and adults. A classic collection of games for all the family. Ideal for Christmas or any family gatherings. Makes a great gift for a child that loves playing board games and gets bored with just one.

Compendium of Games - A complete variety of family board games, as well as playing card games - including Chess, Draughts, Snakes & Ladders, Ludo, Nine Men's Morris, Game of the Goose, Racing Game, Four in a Row, Tic Tac Toe, Solitaire, Dice 1000, Your Neighbour, Hazard, Barbudi, Aces, Cho-Han Bakuchi, Pursuing Sheep, Heaven and Nine, Ten, Cubilete, Yacht, Yartee, General, Chicago, Baseball, Basketball, One-Die Basketball, Beetle, Buck Dice, Drop Dead, Pig, Thirty Six, Par, Centennial
Board Game Collection - This collection of games is all packed into a premium quality box which is perfect as a gift for someone who loves playing and learning new board games.
Games Compendium Family - Recommended for Ages 8+ - The Box includes 5 Double-Sided Playing Boards, playing cards, game necessary game pieces and full instructions for every game included.

This game compendium includes 100 different classic games, ranging from strategy games like Chess and Draughts to fun and easy games like Snakes & Ladders and Ludo. Is this game set suitable for young children? Yes! The board games are designed for ages 6+, making it a fantastic option for families with children. Does this set come with all the game pieces needed? Yes! The set includes game boards, playing pieces, dice, playing cards, and instructions, so you have everything required to play immediately. Can this set be used as a travel game? Absolutely! The compact box design makes it easy to carry, making it a great travel companion for holidays and road trips. Is this a good gift for a board game enthusiast? A: Definitely! This 100-game classic compendium collection is perfect for board game lovers, providing a wide variety of games in one stylish set.
